#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define MAXSIZE 1000000
using namespace std;
int main() {
	register int t, i, n, flag;
	char *s;
	scanf("%d", &t );
	while( t-- ) {
		s = new char[ MAXSIZE ];		
		scanf("%s", s );	
		n = strlen( s );
		if( n == 1 )
			printf("valid\n");
		else {
			flag = 1;
			for( i = 0;i < n - 1;i++ )
				if( s[ i ] > s[ i + 1 ] ) {
					flag = 0;
					break;			
				}
			if( flag )
				printf("valid\n");
			else {
					flag = 1;
					for( i = 0;i < n - 1;i++ )
						if( s[ i ] < s[ i + 1 ] ) {
							flag = 0;
							break;			
						}
					if( flag )
						printf("valid\n");
					else
						printf("invalid\n");
			}
		}
		delete s;
	}
	return 0;
}
